unlockCallback(bytes).details: We force the onlyPoolManager modifier by exposing a virtual function after the onlyPoolManager check.

params.data: The data that was passed to the call to unlock

returns._0: Any data that you want to be returned from the unlock call

unlockCallback(bytes).notice: Called by the pool manager on `msg.sender` when the manager is unlocked
